item.title: How to make it so admins cant trade and owners can
item.dc:creator: @smite_range smite range
item.description:
@smite_range wrote:

[quote=“xaviergmail, post:3, topic:297200”]if you want so mods and admins cant trade but owner and normal players can do this

replace

if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}

with

if(other.playerRights > 0 && other.playerRights <3){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 0 && playerRights <3){
return;
}

and if you want it to be only admins cant trade replace this

if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}

with this

if(other.playerRights = 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights = 2){
return;
}

hope it helps :)[/quote]

it sort of did but the rights > 2 makes so admins and owners can trade…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so admins cant trade and owners can
item.dc:creator: @xaviergmail xaviergmail
item.description:
@xaviergmail wrote:

if you want so mods and admins cant trade but owner and normal players can do this

replace

if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}

with

if(other.playerRights > 0 && other.playerRights <3){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 0 && playerRights <3){
return;
}

and if you want it to be only admins cant trade replace this

if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}

with this

if(other.playerRights = 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights = 2){
return;
}

hope it helps

item.title: How to make it so admins cant trade and owners can
item.dc:creator: @smite_range smite range
item.description:
@smite_range wrote:

well the title says it all realy

well im trying to make it so admins cant trade and owners can cuz i cant realy figure out how to i changed the command making owners not aloud to 2 so that admins cant trade but they still can any ideas this is the code…

well the title says all but im trying to make it so admins cant trade i found y owners cant trade so i changed it to 3 (owners number) but it makes admins and owners able to trade any help???

this is the un changed code so owners cant trade

if(other.interfaceOpened){
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(other.action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(tradeTimer != 0){
sM(“You must wait 10 minutes from the creation of your account to trade.”);
return;
}
if(other.tradeTimer != 0){
sM(“Player must wait 10 minutes from the creation of the account to trade.”);
return;
}

Read full topic
